settings.popupcontentshipping:
SHIPPING
  • Standard ground shipping within 2 to 10 business days within the US
RETURNS AND EXCHANGES
  • Easy and complimentary, within 30 days.
  • Custom, clearance, and special order items are not eligible for return or refund except for warranty service.
CLEARANCE ITEMS
  • Open box but in like new condition
  • May take up to 2 weeks processing time to ship for select clearance items.

settings.text2: Formatt Hitech is the first company to apply advanced science and technology to the development of filters for digital photography and cinema. Our Firecrest coating technology allows us to manufacture filters designed for use with the ultra-high megapixel cameras on the market today. With Firecrest, we now offer the most neutral ND filters on the market, the darkest ND filters on the market, and our circular filters are offered in the thinnest rings on the market. Formatt Hitech filters are carefully crafted in the UK.

Application and use of Formatt Hitech filters and systems

settings.text1: The all new Onyx Neutral Density filters!
settings.text2: Onyx is made from tempered hardened optical glass, giving you added protection from accidental drops. For added peace of mind when using the system.
Our best performing and best selling filter class!
Firecrest multi-coating technology to fit any budget.
For mirrorless and smaller format cameras.
Ultimate control for full frame camera systems
Open box items at big discounts

settings.text1: Introducing the Firecrest 100mm Filter Holder MkII
settings.text2: For the MKII, we went back to the drawing board and worked closely with an extensive team of industry leading photographers to build upon the successes of the MKI, whilst taking into account the feedback from our users in order to refine and improve upon every aspect of our holder.
